indications.i: Indicated for Pain and Fever Control
Avoid in patients with severe liver disease

dosage.adult_dose: 1000mg PO
dosage.ped_dose: 15mg/kg

indications.i: Specifically for treatment or diagnosis of Supraventricular Tachycardia

dosage.adult_dose: 6 mg IV push over 1-3 seconds. If no effect after 1-2 minutes, Repeat with 12 mg IV push over 1-3 seconds.
Repeat once if necessary
(use stopcock and 20 ml Normal Saline flush with each dose)
dosage.ped_dose: 0.1 mg/kg IV (Max 6 mg) push over 1-3 seconds. If no effect after 1-2 minutes,
Repeat with 0.2 mg/kg IV (Max 12 mg) push over 1-3 seconds.
Repeat once if necessary
(use stopcock and Normal Saline flush with each dose)

indications.i: Beta-Agonist nebulized treatment for use in respiratory distress with bronchospasm

dosage.adult_dose: 2.5-5.0 mg (3cc) in nebulizer continuously x 3 doses. See local protocol for relative contraindications and/or indications to contact medical control for use of this drug.
dosage.ped_dose: 2.5mg (3cc) in nebulizer continuously x 3 doses. See local protocol for relative contraindications and/or indications to contact medical control for use of this drug.

indications.i: Antiarrhythmic used mainly in wide complex tachycardia and ventricular fibrillation.
Avoid in patients with heart block or profound bradycardia.
Contraindicated in patients with iodine hypersensitivity

dosage.adult_dose: V-Fib/Pulseless V-Tach: 300 mg IV push Repeat dose of 150 mg IV push for recurrent episodes
V-Tach With A Pulse: 150 mg in 100cc D5W over 10 min
dosage.ped_dose: V-Fib/Pulseless V-Tach: 5 mg/kg IV push over 5 minutes May repeat up to 15mg/kg IV
V-Tach With A Pulse: 5 mg/kg IV push over 5 minutes May repeat up to 15mg/kg IV Avoid in Length Tape Color Pink

indications.i: An antiplatelet drug for use in cardiac chest pain

dosage.adult_dose: 81 mg chewable (baby) Aspirin Give 4 tablets to equal usual adult dose
dosage.ped_dose: None

indications.i: Anticholinergic drug used in bradycardias
(For Endotracheal Tube use of this drug, double the dose)
In Organophosphate toxicity, large doses may be required (>10 mg)

dosage.adult_dose: Bradycardia: 0.5 - 1.0 mg IV every 3 – 5 minutes up to 3 mg. (If endotracheal -- max 6 mg)
Organophosphate: 1-2 mg IM or IV otherwise as per medical control
dosage.ped_dose: Bradycardia: 0.02 mg/kg IV, IO (Max 0.5 mg per dose, Max total dose 1mg IV) (Min 0.1 mg) per dose May repeat in 3 - 5 minutes
Organophosphate: 0.05 mg/kg IV or IO otherwise as per medical control

indications.i: Antidote for Nerve Agents or Organophosphate Overdose

dosage.adult_dose: One auto-injector then per medical control
dosage.ped_dose: One pediatric auto-injector then as per medical control

indications.i: Indicated for severe hyperkalemia

dosage.adult_dose: 1 gm IV / IO
Avoid use if pt is taking digoxin
dosage.ped_dose: 20 mg/kg IV or IO slowly

indications.i: Use in altered mental status or hypoglycemic states

dosage.adult_dose: See local protocol for concentration and dosing
dosage.ped_dose: See local protocol for concentration and dosing

indications.i: Seizure control
Mild Sedation

dosage.adult_dose: 4 mg IV / IO initially then 2 mg IV / IO every 3 - 5 minutes up to 10 mg max unless med control dictates
Do not administer IM. The drug is not absorbed.
10 mg Rectally if unable to obtain an IV.
dosage.ped_dose: 0.1 - 0.3 mg/kg IV/IO
(Max dose 4 mg IV, IO)
0.5 mg/kg rectally (Dia-Stat)
(Max dose 10 mg rectally)
Repeat as directed by local protocol

indications.i: Calcium channel blocker used to treat narrow complex SVT
Contraindicated in patients with heart block, ventricular tachycardia, and/or acute MI

dosage.adult_dose: See local protocol for dosing
dosage.ped_dose: None.

indications.i: Antihistamine for control of allergic reactions

dosage.adult_dose: 25-50 mg IV/IO/IM/PO
dosage.ped_dose: 1 mg/kg IV/IO/IM/PO
Do not give in infants less than 3 mo

indications.i: A vasopressor used in shock or hypotensive states

dosage.adult_dose: 2 - 20 micrograms/kg/min IV or IO, titrate to BP systolic of 90 mmHg
dosage.ped_dose: 2 - 20 micrograms/kg/min IV or IO, titrate to BP systolic appropriate for age

indications.i: Vasopressor used in allergic reactions or anaphylaxis

dosage.adult_dose: 0.3 mg IM
See local protocol for relative contraindications and/or indications to contact medical control for use of this drug.
Nebulized: 1 mg mixed with 2 ml of Normal Saline
dosage.ped_dose: 0.01 mg/kg IM
(Max dose 0.3 mg)
Nebulized: 1 mg mixed with 2 ml of Normal Saline

indications.i: Vasopressor used in cardiac arrest.

dosage.adult_dose: 1.0 mg IV / IO
Repeat every 3 - 5 minutes until observe response
(May be given by Endotracheal tube in double the IV dose)
dosage.ped_dose: 0.01 mg/kg IV or IO
(Max dose 1 mg)
Repeat every 3 - 5 minutes per protocol
(May be given by Endotracheal tube in double the IV dose)

indications.i: Sedative used in Drug Assisted Intubation

dosage.adult_dose: 0.3 mg/kg IV / IO
Usual adult dose = 20 mg
dosage.ped_dose: None

indications.i: Narcotic pain relief
Possible beneficial effect in pulmonary edema
Avoid use if BP < 110

dosage.adult_dose: 50-75 mcg IM/IV/IO bolus then 25 mcg IM/IV/IO every 20 minutes until a maximum of 200 mcg or clinical improvement
dosage.ped_dose: 1 mcg/kg IM/IN/IV/IO May repeat 0.5 mcg/kg every 5 minutes Maximum dose 2 mcg/kg

indications.i: Diuretic for pulmonary edema or CHF but no proven benefit in prehospital care

dosage.adult_dose: See local protocol for dosing guidelines
dosage.ped_dose: See local protocol for dosing guidelines

indications.i: Drug acting to release glucose into blood stream by glycogen breakdown
Use in patients with no IV access

dosage.adult_dose: 1 - 2 mg IM
Repeat blood glucose measurement in 15 minutes, if ≤ 69 mg / dl repeat dose.
dosage.ped_dose: 0.1 mg/kg IM, Maximum 1 mg
Repeat blood glucose measurement in 15 minutes, if ≤ 69 mg / dl repeat dose.

indications.i: Use in conscious hypoglycemic states

dosage.adult_dose: One tube or packet
Repeat based on blood glucose results, per protocol
dosage.ped_dose: One Tube or packet
Repeat based on blood glucose results, per protocol
Consider patient’s ability to swallow and follow directions based on age

indications.i: Medication to assist with sedation of agitated patients

dosage.adult_dose: 2.5-10 mg IV/IM, per local protocol
See local protocol for relative contraindications and/or indications to contact medical control for use of this drug.
dosage.ped_dose: None

indications.i: Avoid NSAIDS in women who are pregnant or could be pregnant.
A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used for pain and fever control.
Not to be used in patients with history of GI Bleeding (ulcers) or renal insufficiency.
Not to be used in patients with allergies to aspirin or other NSAID drugs
Avoid in patients currently taking anticoagulants, such as coumadin.

dosage.ped_dose: 10 mg/kg po
Do not use in patients 6 months of age or younger

indications.i: Medication used in addition to albuterol to assist in patients with asthma and COPD

dosage.adult_dose: 2 puffs per dose of MDI (18 mcg/spray) ---OR--- 0.5 mg per nebulizer treatment
dosage.ped_dose: Use in Pediatrics as a combined Therapy with a Beta Agonist such as Albuterol
2 puffs per dose of MDI (18 mcg/spray) ---OR--- 0.5 mg per nebulizer treatment

indications.i: Avoid NSAIDS in women who are pregnant or could be pregnant
A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used for pain control.
Not to be used in patients with history of GI bleeding (ulcers), renal insufficiency, or in patients who may need immediate surgical intervention (i.e. obvious fractures).
Not to be used in patients with allergies to aspirin or other NSAID drugs such as motrin
Avoid in patients currently taking anticoagulants such as coumadin

dosage.adult_dose: 30 mg IV / IO or 60 mg IM
dosage.ped_dose: 0.5 mg/kg IV / IO / IM Maximum 30 mg

indications.i: Crystalloid solution preferred for fluid rescuscitation and preferred in burn care.

dosage.adult_dose: Dosing per protocol, similar to Normal Saline
dosage.ped_dose: Dosing per protocol, similar to Normal Saline

indications.i: Antiarrhythmic used for control of ventricular dysrrythmias
See local protocol for specific dosing algorithm

dosage.adult_dose: 1.5 mg/kg IV / IO bolus (ETT dose = 2 x IV dose) up to 3mg/kg max bolus dose
dosage.ped_dose: 1 mg/kg IV / IO Maximum 100 mg Repeat 0.5 mg/kg Maximum 3 mg/kg total

indications.i: Elemental electrolyte used to treat eclampsia during the third trimester of pregnancy
A smooth muscle relaxor used in refractory respiratory distress resistent to beta-agonists

dosage.adult_dose: Respiriatory Distress: 2 g IV / IO over 10 minutes Repeat dosing per local protocol
Obstetrical Seizure: 2 g IV / IO over 2-3 minutes Dose may be repeated once, or as per local protocol
dosage.ped_dose: 40 mg/kg IV / IO over 20 minutes (Max 2 gms)
Repeat dosing per local protocol

indications.i: Steroid used in respiratory distress to reverse inflammatory and allergic reactions

dosage.adult_dose: 125 mg IV / IO
IM dosing only if indicated by local protocol
dosage.ped_dose: 2 mg/kg IV / IO (Max 125 mg)
IM dosing only if indicated by local protocol

indications.i: Benzodiazepine used to control seizures and sedation
Quick acting Benzodiazepine
Preferred over Valium for IM use
Use with caution if BP < 110

dosage.adult_dose: See individual protocols for dosing
Usual total dose: 2.5-5 mg IV / IO / IM
dosage.ped_dose: See individual protocols for dosing
Usual total dose 0.1-0.2 mg/kg IV / IO / IM / IN

indications.i: Narcotic pain relief
Possible beneficial effect in pulmonary edema
Avoid use if BP < 110

dosage.adult_dose: 4 mg IM/IV/IO bolus then 2 mg IM/IV/IO every 5-10 minutes until a maximum of 10 mg or clinical improvement
dosage.ped_dose: 0.1 mg/kg IV / IO / IM May repeat every 5 minutes Maximum single dose 5 mg Maximum dose 10 mg

indications.i: Narcotic antagonist

dosage.adult_dose: 0.4 - 2 mg IV / IO / IM / IN / ETT bolus titrated to patient’s respiratory response
dosage.ped_dose: 0.1 mg/kg IV / IO / IN / IM / ETT (Max 2 mg)
Repeat as per protocol

indications.i: IV fluid for IV access or volume infusion

dosage.adult_dose: See individual protocol for bolus dosing and/or infusion rate
dosage.ped_dose: See individual protocol for bolus dosing and/or infusion rate
Usual initial bolus 20 mL / kg IV / IO

indications.i: Vasodilator used in anginal syndromes and CHF.

dosage.adult_dose: 0.3 / 0.4 mg SL every 5 minutes until painfree
See Chest Pain Protocol for paste dosing
dosage.ped_dose: None

indications.i: Medication used to assist with control of pain

dosage.adult_dose: Inhaled gas to effect per local protocol
dosage.ped_dose: Inhaled gas to effect per local protocol

indications.i: Anti-Emetic used to control Nausea and/or Vomiting
Ondansetron (Zofran) is the recommended Anti-emetic for EMS use since it is associated with significantly less side effects and sedation.

dosage.adult_dose: 4 mg IV / IO / IM / PO / ODT
Repeat only as per local protocol
dosage.ped_dose: 0.15 mg/kg IV / IO / IM (Max 4 mg)
0.2 mg/kg PO / ODT (Max 4 mg)
Repeat only as per local protocol

indications.i: Indicated in any condition with increased cardiac work load, respiratory distress, or illness or injury resulting in altered ventilation and/or perfusion. Goal oxygen saturation 94-99%
Indicated for pre-oxygenation whenever possible prior to endotracheal intubation. Goal oxygen saturation 100%.

dosage.adult_dose: 1-4 liters/min via nasal cannula
6-15 liters/min via NRB mask
15 liters via BVM / ETT / BIAD
dosage.ped_dose: 1-4 liters/min via nasal cannula
6-15 liters/min via NRB mask
15 liters via BVM / ETT / BIAD

indications.i: Vasoconstrictor used with nasal intubation and epistaxis
Relative Contraindication is significant hypertension

dosage.adult_dose: 2 sprays in affected nostril
Usual concentration is 0.05% by volume
dosage.ped_dose: 1-2 sprays in affected nostril
Usual concentration is 0.05% by volume

indications.i: Antidote for Nerve Agents or Organophosphate Overdose
Administered with Atropine

dosage.adult_dose: 600 mg IV / IO / IM over 30 minutes for minor symptoms
1800 mg IV / IO / IM over 30 minutes for major symptoms
See local protocol for minor versus major indications
dosage.ped_dose: 15 – 25 mg/kg IV / IM / IO over 30 minutes
See local protocol for specific pediatric dosing recommendations

indications.i: IV Promethazine (Phenergan) should be given IV only with great caution. Extravasation of this drug can result in significant local tissue damage.
Anti-Emetic used to control Nausea and/or Vomiting
Ondansetron (Zofran) is the recommended Anti-emetic for EMS use since it is associated with significantly less side effects and sedation.Anti-Emetic used to control Nausea and/or Vomiting

dosage.adult_dose: 12.5 mg IV / IO / IM
May repeat as per local protocol
dosage.ped_dose: None

indications.i: Non-depolarizing paralytic agent used as a component of drug assisted intubation (Rapid Sequence Intubation), when succinylcholine is contraindicated
Onset of action is longer than succinylcholine, up to 3 minutes, patient will NOT defasciculate

dosage.adult_dose: 1 mg / kg IV / IO
Only may repeat x1 per RSI protocol
dosage.ped_dose: None

indications.i: A buffer used in acidosis to increase the pH in Cardiac Arrest Hyperkalemia or Tricyclic Overdose

dosage.adult_dose: Initial bolus 50 mEq IV / IO
See individual protocol for specific dosing algorithm
dosage.ped_dose: Initial bolus 1 mEq / kg IV / IO
Maximum 50 mEq
See individual protocol for specific dosing algorithm

indications.i: Paralytic Agent used as a component of Drug Assisted Intubation (Rapid Sequence Intubation)
Avoid in patients with burns greater than 24 hours old, chronic neuromuscular disease (e.g., muscular dystrophy), ESRD, or other situation in which hyperkalemia is likely.

dosage.adult_dose: 1.5 mg/kg IV / IO
Only may repeat x1 per RSI protocol
dosage.ped_dose: None

indications.i: Medication used in place of and/or in addition to epinephrine in the setting of cardiac arrest

dosage.adult_dose: 40 units IV / IO, may replace first or second dose of epinephrine
dosage.ped_dose: None

indications.i: Long-acting non-depolarizing paralytic agent
Avoid in patients with chronic neuromuscular disease (e.g., muscular dystrophy)

dosage.adult_dose: 0.1 mg/kg IV / IO or 10 mg IV / IO, as per individual protocol
Only may repeat dosing as per individual protocol
dosage.ped_dose: None
